title: 4.2 Reminiscing about past technologies and how they affected the economy
itunes:title: 4.2 Reminiscing about past technologies and how they affected the economy
description:
Reminiscing on technological changes we have witnessed over the last few decades and how they impact our lives, business and economy.

Podcast Hosted by Almir Colan - Links > https://www.almircolan.com/links

Podcast Links > https://www.islamicfinancepodcast.com/links

Don’t forget to rate our podcast *5 stars* wherever you listen to us!
